_a-0000e825-ca6c-8000-9bf8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetContractTypeDetails
_a-0000e825-ca6c-8000-9bf8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_CLAUSESET_CONTRACT_TYPE,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_ClauseSet_ContractType_Map',
  returnType: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!returnType,
    default: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
  ),
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!setId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "setId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!setId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: a!defaultValue(value: ri!isActive, default: true()),
      applywhen: ri!showInactive <> true()
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  sort: ri!sort,
  aggregation: ri!aggregation
)

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_dropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*The main rule to "cleanse" the input of a WriteRecords SS node to remove non-writable relationships.

STANDARD USAGE:
- Use this in tandem with rule AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable (see that description)
- In the input of a WriteRecords SS (NOT in a previous script task), do:
  A - Expressionable input to "Records" intput
  B - rule!AS_GCM_dropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord(
    records: pv![the pv to write],
    relationships: {list of record relationships that are not allowed to be written}
  )

IMPORTANT GENERAL NOTES: 
- The reason to run this in the input of the WriteRecords SS instead of a previous script task
is that, when used with AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable, you can maintain the relationships
that you had to drop before writing.
  -> For example, if you are writing "Case" but it has a child-relationship "Address" that cannot be written,
    - this will drop "Address" before attempting to write
    - if the output is configured properly it will reattach "Address" in the output
    - the overall result is that you basically ran the node as if "Address" was ignored, 
      so that you can use it later in the process flow
*/
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
  items: a!flatten(ri!records),
  expression: reduce(
    rule!AS_GCM_dropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord_Reducer(record: _, relationship: _),
    fv!item,
    a!defaultValue(
      value: ri!nonWritableRelationships,
      default: difference(
        rule!AS_GCM_getAllPresentRelationshipsFromRecord(records: fv!item),
        ri!writableRelationships
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_getAllPresentRelationshipsFromRecord

_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_updateDataByModifierMaps
_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
The modifierMaps should have the below structure
{
a!map(
field: <The field which needs to be modified>,
find: Optional when findRegex is provided - The value to find,
findRegex: Optional when find is provided - The regex search performed to replace the value,
replaceWith: The value to replace with. When left blank the find values will be removed,
instanceNum: The instance number to which replace. Use only when the find is passed,
replaceAllInstances: Default true - Determines whether all the instances need to be replaced
applyWhen: When false this map will be skipped
),
...
}
*/
if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!modifierMaps),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!data,
    expression: reduce(
      rule!AS_GCM_updateDataByModifierMaps_Reducer(data: _, modifierMap: _),
      fv!item,
      ri!modifierMaps
    )
  ),
  ri!data
)

_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)

_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_updateDataByModifierMaps_Reducer
_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  and(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(
      input: index(ri!data, ri!modifierMap.field, null)
    ),
    ri!modifierMap.applyWhen
  ),
  #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
    ri!data,
    ri!modifierMap.field,
    a!match(
      value: ri!modifierMap,
      whenTrue: and(
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.findRegex),
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.find)
      ),
      then: error(
        "Only one of two parameters should have values: findRegex or find"
      ),
      whenTrue: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.findRegex),
      then: if(
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.instanceNum),
        error(
          "instanceNum should be null when passing a value to findRegex"
        ),
        regexreplaceall(
          ri!modifierMap.findRegex,
          ri!data[ri!modifierMap.field],
          ri!modifierMap.replaceWith
        )
      ),
      whenTrue: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.find),
      then: rule!AS_GCM_substituteListFromTextUsingReduce(
        text: ri!data[ri!modifierMap.field],
        find: ri!modifierMap.find,
        replaceWith: ri!modifierMap.replaceWith,
        instanceNum: ri!modifierMap.instanceNum,
        replaceAllInstances: a!defaultValue(
          value: ri!modifierMap.replaceAllInstances,
          default: a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.instanceNum)
        )
      ),
      default: error(
        "Alteast one of two parameters should have values: findRegex or find"
      )
    )
  ),
  ri!data
)

_a-0001eda5-a49c-8000-9e01-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QR_getRefClauseSectionMapping
_a-0001eda5-a49c-8000-9e01-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS GCM R Clause Section Mapping,
  /*castToCdtType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_R_Section',*/
  returnType: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
    nullableValue: ri!returnType,
    replacementValue: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
  ),
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  filters: {
    ri!filters,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS GCM R Clause Section Mapping.clauseId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!clauseIds,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!clauseIds)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS GCM R Clause Section Mapping.isActive,
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultTrue(ri!includeInactiveData)
    )
  },
  fields: ri!fields
)

_a-0000e9c7-4e42-8000-9c64-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QNM_cloneQuestionPrecedentSets_RuntimeFromQuestionnaire
_a-0000e9c7-4e42-8000-9c64-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
  items: ri!questionPrecedentSets,
  expression: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM:QNM}AS_GCM_QNM_QuestionPrecedentSet'(
    operator: fv!item.operator,
    fieldKey: fv!item.fieldKey,
    questionPrecedentSets: rule!AS_GCM_QNM_cloneQuestionPrecedentSets_RuntimeFromQuestionnaire(
      questions: ri!questions,
      questionPrecedentSets: fv!item.questionPrecedentSets
    ),
    questionPrecedents: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: fv!item.questionPrecedents,
      expression: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM:QNM}AS_GCM_QNM_QuestionPrecedent'(
        questionId_precedent: wherecontains(
          fv!item.questionId_precedent,
          ri!questions.questionId
        ),
        responseRequirement: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
          items: fv!item.responseRequirement,
          expression: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM:QNM}AS_GCM_QNM_ResponseRequirement'(
            fieldKey: fv!item.fieldKey,
            requirementTypeCode: fv!item.requirementTypeCode,
            requirementValue: fv!item.requirementValue
          )
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(
  label: ri!label,

    label: ri!label,

    readOnly: true
  ),

  align: ri!align,
  accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
)

_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_queryRecordByIdentifier
_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*

PLEASE REFER TO THE BOTTOM OF THIS RULE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO USE

Please DO NOT auto-format this rule

*/
a!localVariables(
  /*Determine the castResultToType*/
  local!castResultToType: a!defaultValue(ri!castToCdtType, ri!recordType),
  /*Execute the query*/
  local!queryResult: a!refreshVariable(
    value: if(
      ri!executeWhen = false,
      null(ri!recordType),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
        recordType: ri!recordType,
        identifier: ri!identifier,
        fields: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
          {
            ri!fields,
            index(
              ri!relatedRecordData,
              "relationship",
              null
            )
          }
        ),
        relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
      )
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh,
    refreshInterval: ri!refreshInterval,
    refreshAfter: { "RECORD_ACTION" }
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: local!castResultToType,
    value: local!queryResult
  )
)/*

DOCUMENTATION

This rule is designed to minimize the overhead with querying data and then casting the result


Required Inputs:

1. recordType
- This is a recordtype! input of the data type to be queried against

2. identifier
- The primary key of the record type which needs to be queried

Optional Inputs:

3. executeWhen
- The query will not execute if this is false, the query will execute if this is true or null
-- This is meant to operate in a similar manner to the showWhen parameter of components
- Use this to skip execution of a query without needing to wrap if() statements around the rule
-- Examples of this would be to skip querying if your filter value is a null ID
- If the query does not execute, this will return a null value whose type is based on the returnType input

4. triggerRefresh
- By default, the query will always re-execute whenever any inputs change
- However, by updating the value of triggerRefresh, you can also trigger a re-execution even if none of the other inputs change (e.g. after a record action)

5. castToCdtType
- Any cdt type to the cast the result set. 

6. fields
- The record fields that need to be queried

7. relatedRecordData
- the relatedRecordData in which the filters and limit can be specified for each relationship

*/

_a-0000e6c8-d132-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_queryRecord

_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_whereContains

_a-0000ed08-d796-8000-9dda-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_Filter
_a-0000ed08-d796-8000-9dda-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!fieldValuePairs,
    default: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchingCriteria: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!matchingCriteria,
    default: "ALL"
  ),
  local!matchType: a!defaultValue(value: ri!matchType, default: "EXACT"),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_Filter_Reducer(
        matchingCriteria: local!matchingCriteria,
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _,
        matchType: local!matchType
      ),
      a!match(
        value: local!matchingCriteria,
        equals: "ALL",
        then: enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
        equals: "ANY",
        then: {},
        default: fn!error(
          "Invalid matchingCriteria, must be one of: ALL, ANY"
        )
      ),
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(value: ri!filterType, default: "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_updateClauseSetDetailsOnSubmission

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_displayValue
_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
displayvalue(
  
  ri!value,
  
  ri!inArray,
  
  ri!replacement,
  
  if(
    
    ri!firstIsDefault,
    ri!replacement[1],
    
    ri!lastIsDefault,
    ri!replacement[count(ri!replacement)],
    
    ri!customDefault
  )
)

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_filterRecords
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords_Reducer(
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _
      ),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

_a-0000ed52-a319-8000-9df0-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel_RichText
_a-0000ed52-a319-8000-9df0-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!label: ri!bundle[ri!bundleKey],
  local!updatedLabel: a!defaultValue(local!label, ri!bundleKey),
  local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!richTextArguments),
    local!updatedLabel,
    reduce(
      rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument_RichText(
        richTextItems: _,
        index: _,
        richTextArguments: ri!richTextArguments
      ),
      { local!updatedLabel },
      enumerate(count(ri!richTextArguments)) + 1
    )
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: local!updatedLabelForArguments,
    expression: if(
      typeof(fv!item) = 'type!{urn:com:appian:typesAS:CO}AS_CO_RichTextArgument',
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
        text: fv!item.argument,
        style: fv!item.style,
        size: fv!item.size,
        color: fv!item.color,
        link: fv!item.link,
        linkStyle: fv!item.linkStyle
      ),
      fv!item
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e9c7-4e42-8000-9c64-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QNM_cloneQuestions_RuntimeFromQuestionnaire
_a-0000e9c7-4e42-8000-9c64-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
  items: ri!questions,
  expression: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM:QNM}AS_GCM_QNM_Question'(
    questionId: if(ri!isPreview, fv!index, null),
    questionReferenceId: fv!item.questionReferenceId,
    questionTemplateId: fv!item.questionTemplateId,
    label: fv!item.label,
    instructions: fv!item.instructions,
    pageNumber: fv!item.pageNumber,
    groupNumber: fv!item.groupNumber,
    orderNumber: fv!item.orderNumber,
    responseOptions: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: fv!item.responseOptions,
      expression: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM:QNM}AS_GCM_QNM_Response'(
        fieldKey: fv!item.fieldKey,
        label: fv!item.label,
        value: fv!item.value
      )
    ),
    responseRequirements: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: fv!item.responseRequirements,
      expression: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM:QNM}AS_GCM_QNM_ResponseRequirement'(
        fieldKey: fv!item.fieldKey,
        requirementTypeCode: fv!item.requirementTypeCode,
        requirementValue: fv!item.requirementValue
      )
    ),
    responses: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: fv!item.responses,
      expression: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM:QNM}AS_GCM_QNM_Response'(
        fieldKey: fv!item.fieldKey,
        label: fv!item.label,
        value: fv!item.value
      )
    ),
    isExternalUserFacing: fv!item.isExternalUserFacing,
    isDisplayedPrecedentSets: rule!AS_GCM_QNM_cloneQuestionPrecedentSets_RuntimeFromQuestionnaire(
      questions: ri!questions,
      questionPrecedentSets: fv!item.isDisplayedPrecedentSets
    ),
    isRequiredPrecedentSets: rule!AS_GCM_QNM_cloneQuestionPrecedentSets_RuntimeFromQuestionnaire(
      questions: ri!questions,
      questionPrecedentSets: fv!item.isRequiredPrecedentSets
    ),
    questionCategoryId: wherecontains(
      fv!item.questionCategoryId,
      ri!questionCategories.questionCategoryId
    ),
    questionTypeCode: fv!item.questionTypeCode
  )
)

_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_safeLink

_a-0000eae2-5167-8000-9ce4-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GAM_returnCdtOrRecordIndicesByField

_a-0000e3ff-a5bc-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_displayValueMultiple

_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetClauseDetails
_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  sort: ri!sort,
  entity: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_CLAUSE_SET_CLAUSE,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_ClauseSet_Clause',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!setId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!relationId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  batchSize: ri!batchSize,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "relationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!relationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "setId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!setId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applywhen: ri!showInactive <> true()
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation
)

_a-0000e9c7-4e42-8000-9c64-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QNM_cloneQuestionnaire_RuntimeFromQuestionnaire
_a-0000e9c7-4e42-8000-9c64-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM:QNM}AS_GCM_QNM_Questionnaire'(
  questionnaireTemplateId: ri!questionnaire.questionnaireTemplateId,
  questionCategories: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!questionnaire.questionCategories,
    expression: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM:QNM}AS_GCM_QNM_QuestionCategory'(
      questionCategoryId: if(ri!isPreview, fv!index, null),
      questionCategoryName: fv!item.questionCategoryName,
      questionCategoryDescription: fv!item.questionCategoryDescription,
      displayOrder: fv!item.displayOrder
    )
  ),
  questions: rule!AS_GCM_QNM_cloneQuestions_RuntimeFromQuestionnaire(
    questions: ri!questionnaire.questions,
    isPreview: ri!isPreview,
    questionCategories: ri!questionnaire.questionCategories
  ),
  questionnaireStatusCode: cons!AS_GCM_QNM_REF_CODE_QUESTIONNAIRE_STATUS_NOT_STARTED
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_compare

_a-0000e915-02bc-8000-9c1f-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_substituteListFromTextUsingReduce

_a-0000e9b7-c1f0-8000-9c5e-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_FM_createAwardFromSolicitation
_a-0000e9b7-c1f0-8000-9c5e-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GCM_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null()),
  local!clauseSet: rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFields(
    cdt: rule!AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetDetails(
      setId: ri!solicitationSetId,
      returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT
    ),
    fields: "setNumber",
    newValues: null()
  ),
  local!clauseSetClauses: rule!AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetClauseDetailsWithBatching(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    setId: ri!solicitationSetId,
    executeWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!solicitationSetId),
    onlyGetFieldsForWrite: true(),
    showInactive: true(),
    additionalFilters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "refClause.refType.refDataId",
      operator: "=",
      value: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_TYPE_CLAUSE
    ),
    logicalExpression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
      operator: "OR",
      filters: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: "isActive",
          operator: "=",
          value: true()
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: "refUsage.refDataId",
          operator: "=",
          value: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_USAGE_EXCLUDED
        )
      }
    ),
    batchingSize: cons!AS_GCM_INT_QUERY_BATCH_SIZE_LARGE
  ),
  local!clauseSetTemplates: rule!AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetTemplateDetails(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT,
    executeWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!solicitationSetId),
    setId: ri!solicitationSetId
  ),
  local!questionnaire: rule!AS_GCM_QNM_QR_getQuestionnaire(
    setId: ri!solicitationSetId,
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT
  ),
  local!contractTypeMaps: rule!AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetContractTypeDetails(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    executeWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!solicitationSetId),
    setId: ri!solicitationSetId,
    sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
      field: "contractType.contractTypeId",
      ascending: true()
    )
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_formLayout_v1"(
    label: "Create Award from Solicitation",
    contents: {
      rule!AS_GCM_CPS_createAwardClauseSetFromSolicitation(
        setNumber: local!clauseSet.setNumber,
        bundle: local!bundle
      )
    },
    buttons: rule!AS_CO_CPS_cancelSaveButtons(
      confirmLabel: "",
      cancelLabel: "Cancel",
      confirmSaveInto: {
        a!save(
          ri!userAction,
          cons!AS_GCM_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_CREATE
        ),
        /* ***To limit the scope of the hotfix 1.9.1,
        cloning the below saves in AS GCM Create Award From Solicitation Wrapper***
        TODO: While working on this interface or in process in future,
        we need to change this to follow modular coding instead of duplicating.
        */
        a!localVariables(
          local!updatedValues: rule!AS_GCM_updateMapforCreateAwardFromSolicitation(
            clauseSet: local!clauseSet,
            contractTypes: local!contractTypeMaps,
            clauseSetClauses: local!clauseSetClauses,
            clauseSetTemplate: local!clauseSetTemplates
          ),
          /* Saving the Clause set details */
          {
            a!save(
              ri!clauseSet,
              local!updatedValues.updatedClauseSet
            ),
            a!save(
              ri!clauseSetClauses,
              local!updatedValues.updatedClauseSetClauses
            ),
            a!save(
              ri!clauseSetTemplate,
              local!updatedValues.updatedClauseSetTemplate
            ),
            a!save(
              ri!contractTypeMaps,
              local!updatedValues.updatedContractTypes
            ),
            a!save(
              ri!questionnaire,
              rule!AS_GCM_QNM_UT_cloneQuestionnaire(
                questionnaire:local!questionnaire
              )
            ),
            a!save(
              ri!reviewClauses,
              rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
                cdt: local!updatedValues.updatedClauseSetClauses,
                field: "isActive",
                value: true
              )
            ),
            /* Saving the excluded clause to selected clause */
            a!save(
              ri!selectedClauses,
              rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
                cdt: local!updatedValues.updatedClauseSetClauses,
                field: "refUsage.refDataId",
                value: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_USAGE_EXCLUDED
              )
            )
          }
        ),

      },
      cancelSaveInto: a!save(
        ri!userAction,
        cons!AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_CANCEL
      ),
      confirmSubmit: true(),
      cancelSubmit: true(),
      confirmAccessibilityText: "",
      cancelAccessibilityText: ""
    )
  )
)

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
The main rule to merge the ID-output of a WriteRecords SS node back to the input process variable.

STANDARD USAGE:
- Use this in tandem with rule AS_GCM_dropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord (see that description)
- In the output of a WriteRecords SS, do:
  A - New Custom Output
  B - rule!AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable(
        processData: pv![the pv your wrote],
        recordsUpdated: ac!RecordsUpdated,
        fksToParent: {list of record fields that are FKs to the primary PK you wrote}
      )
  C - Save this back to the pv you wrote

MAPPING FKS:
- Using this rule in the current state, child-FKs can only be set 
where they map back to the primary record type, using input "fksToParent".
  -> For example, if you are writing "Case", 
    - you could set "Case.Comment.caseId"
    - you could set "Case.Comment.Replies.caseId"
    - but not "Case.Comment.Replies.commentId" (since the FK "commentId" is not the PK of "Case")
- To set other foreign keys, you would have to run manual update rules using the result of this.
Note:
- "fksToParent" is optimized for 1:M relationships.
  - Setting an fkToParent for a 1:1 will create an instance of that child record if it is null.

IMPORTANT GENERAL NOTES: 
- The result of THIS rule will have data that IS considered changed, 
so a designer should be cautious about re-writing this later in process 
as it could cause race condition and performance side affects.

- Also, the result of this WILL NOT have custom-fields calculated, 
since they can be changed as a result of the write, but this rule is not re-querying.
If you need these, then re-query.

- This should generally only be used for downstream flows that don't write it directly again, 
such as document processing, emails, etc.
*/
if(
  or(
    runtimetypeof(ri!recordsUpdated) = runtimetypeof(a!flatten(ri!recordsUpdated)),
    runtimetypeof(ri!recordsUpdated) = 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Variant?list'
  ),
  if(
    count(a!flatten(ri!recordsUpdated)) = 0,
    ri!processData,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!recordsUpdated))),
      expression: rule!AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable(
        processData: a!flatten(ri!processData)[fv!index],
        recordsUpdated: cast(
          runtimetypeof(a!flatten(ri!processData)),
          ri!recordsUpdated
        )[fv!index],
        fksToParent: ri!fksToParent
      )
    )
  ),
  a!localVariables(
    local!keys: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!keys(ri!recordsUpdated),
      expression: a!map(
        key: fv!item,
        isPrimaryKey: runtimetypeof(fv!item) = 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}RecordField'
      )
    ),
    local!keysOrganized: rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords(
      records: local!keys,
      field: "isPrimaryKey",
      value: true,
      filterType: "FULL_RESULT"
    ),
    local!primaryKeyField: local!keysOrganized.firstMatch.key,
    local!updates: rule!AS_GCM_setRecordFields(
      record: ri!processData,
      neverOverwrite: {
        a!map(
          field: local!primaryKeyField,
          value: ri!recordsUpdated[local!primaryKeyField]
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
          items: ri!fksToParent,
          expression: a!map(
            field: fv!item,
            value: ri!recordsUpdated[local!primaryKeyField],
            /*Children get complicated, and an update should only run if a child is actually attached*/
            applyWhen: a!match(
              value: runtimetypeof(ri!processData[fv!item]),
              equals: runtimetypeof(a!flatten(ri!processData[fv!item])),
              then: count(ri!processData[fv!item]) > 0,
              equals: tointeger(
                'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Variant?list'
              ),
              then: or(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  items: ri!processData[fv!item],
                  expression: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(fv!item)
                )
              ),
              default: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!processData[fv!item])
            )
          )
        )
      },
      childRelationships: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: local!keysOrganized.rejects,
        expression: a!map(
          field: fv!item.key,
          value: if(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!processData[fv!item.key]),
            ri!recordsUpdated[fv!item.key],
            rule!AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable(
              processData: ri!processData[fv!item.key],
              recordsUpdated: ri!recordsUpdated[fv!item.key],
              fksToParent: {}
            )
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    local!updates
  )
)

_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_urlForRecord

_a-0000e5da-a251-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GAM_UT_recordDashboardLink
_a-0000e5da-a251-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!style: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
    nullableValue: ri!style,
    replacementValue: "STRONG"
  ),
  if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultTrue(ri!newTab),
    rule!AS_CO_UT_safeLink(
      uri: substitute(
        rule!AS_GAM_UT_urlForRecordDashboard(
          recordType: ri!recordType,
          recordId: ri!recordId,
          siteWebAddressIdentifier: ri!siteWebAddressIdentifier,
          sitePage: ri!sitePage,
          dashboardUrlStub: ri!dashboardUrlStub
        ),
        "summary",
        ri!dashboardUrlStub
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
      text: ri!label,
      style: local!style,
      color: ri!color,
      link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
        label: ri!label,
        recordType: ri!recordType,
        identifier: ri!recordId,
        dashboard: ri!dashboardUrlStub
      ),
      linkStyle: ri!linkStyle,
      showWhen: ri!showWhen
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_returnCdtFields

_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GAM_UT_queryEntityWithSelection

_a-0000e897-ddd7-8000-9c0c-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetClauseDetailsWithBatching
_a-0000e897-ddd7-8000-9c0c-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!relationIds: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!relationIds,
    default: index(
      rule!AS_GAM_UT_queryEntityWithSelection(
        entity: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_CLAUSE_SET_CLAUSE,
        pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(startIndex: 1, batchSize: - 1),
        filters: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "setId",
            operator: "=",
            value: ri!setId
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "isActive",
            operator: "=",
            value: true(),
            applyWhen: ri!showInActive <> true()
          ),
          ri!additionalFilters
        },
        selectionColumns: { "relationId" },
        logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
        triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
        executeWhen: and(
          ri!executeWhen,
          or(
            any(
              rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
              {
                ri!additionalFilters,
                ri!logicalExpression,
                ri!aggregation
              }
            ),
            a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!setId),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!relationIds)
          )
        )
      ).data,
      "relationId",
      {}
    )
  ),
  local!batches: rule!AS_GCM_UT_getIdentifiersInBatches(
    identifiers: local!relationIds,
    batchingSize: a!defaultValue(
      ri!batchingSize,
      cons!AS_GCM_INT_QUERY_BATCH_SIZE_TINY
    ),
    returnType: ri!returnType,
    pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo
  ),
  local!selectionColumns: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!selectionColumns,
    default: if(
      ri!onlyGetFieldsForWrite = true(),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
        array: {
          "relationId",
          "setId",
          "refClause.clauseId",
          "clauseTitle",
          "retainedClauseTitle",
          "alternateValue",
          "section",
          "refUsage.refDataId",
          "refUsage.refLabel",
          "refStatus.refDataId",
          "refAddedVia.refDataId",
          "effectiveDate",
          "validationAction",
          "retainedEffectiveDate",
          "refFormat.refDataId",
          "format.refDataId",
          "refReasonForRemoval",
          "justificationForRemoval",
          "isEditedViaEditClause",
          "isClauseUpdated",
          "isRemovedManually",
          "createdBy",
          "createdDatetime",
          "modifiedBy",
          "modifiedDatetime",
          "isActive",
          ri!selectAdditionalFieldsForWrite
        }
      ),
      {}
    )
  ),
  local!data: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!relationIds),
    {},
    a!flatten(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: local!batches,
        expression: if(
          and(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(input: local!selectionColumns),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(value: ri!aggregation)
          ),
          rule!AS_GCM_UT_nullifyEmptyNestedCdtFields(
            cdt: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
              type: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_ClauseSet_Clause?list',
              value: rule!AS_GAM_UT_queryEntityWithSelection(
                entity: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_CLAUSE_SET_CLAUSE,
                entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_ClauseSet_Clause',
                returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
                pagingInfo: a!defaultValue(
                  value: ri!pagingInfo,
                  default: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
                    startIndex: 1,
                    batchSize: count(fv!item.identifiers),
                    sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(field: "relationId", ascending: true())
                  )
                ),
                filters: {
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                    field: "relationId",
                    operator: "in",
                    value: tointeger(fv!item.identifiers)
                  ),
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                    field: "isActive",
                    operator: "=",
                    value: true(),
                    applyWhen: ri!showInActive <> true()
                  ),
                  ri!additionalFilters
                },
                selectionColumns: local!selectionColumns,
                logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
                triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
                executeWhen: and(
                  ri!executeWhen,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(input: fv!item.identifiers)
                )
              ).data
            )
          ),
          rule!AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetClauseDetails(
            relationId: fv!item.identifiers,
            returnType: a!defaultValue(
              value: ri!returnType,
              default: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
            ),
            executeWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(input: fv!item.identifiers),
            aggregation: ri!aggregation,
            logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
            additionalFilters: ri!additionalFilters,
            pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
            triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
            sort: ri!sort,
            showInActive: ri!showInActive
          )
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  rule!AS_GCM_UT_formatDataBasedOnReturnType(
    data: local!data,
    pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
    returnType: ri!returnType
  )
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition
AS_CO_INP_textField
_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  ri!readOnly,
  rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
    label: ri!label,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    value: ri!value,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
    align: ri!align
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: false
    ),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    placeholder: ri!placeholder,
    value: ri!value,
    /* We are using nested saveIntos to automatically perform a trim on any value */
    /* before executing the actual saves */
    /* Saves can be nested in this format to allow for better reusability */
    saveInto: a!save(ri!saveInto, trim(save!value)),
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
    /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    masked: ri!masked,
    validations: if(
      ri!readOnly,
      {},
      a!flatten(
        {
          ri!validations,
          rule!AS_CO_VD_textValidation(value: ri!value, maxLength: ri!maxLength)
        }
      )
    ),
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    align: ri!align,
    accessibilitytext: ri!accessibilityText,
    refreshAfter: ri!refreshAfter,
    characterLimit: ri!characterLimit,
    showCharacterCount: ri!showCharacterCount,
    inputPurpose: ri!inputPurpose
  )
)

_a-0000eb44-a528-8000-9d15-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage
